page.title: 06HOMELIFE IN TREDEGAR 1985
page.content: Our class did a survey of families. We found out that the average number of children is 2-4. Not many people have gradparents living with them in the same house. Only 2 children were born in another town apart from tredegar. Few families live in bungalows or flats, most live in houses. Modern homes of 1985 are very comfortable, because of insulation, double-glazing, central-heating and furnishings. We made a graph to see who had videos, music-centres and microwave ovans, most people had some of these. We've all got carpets, curtains and comfortable. There are many kinds of leisure activities we can do at home such as music centres, TV and videos. There are also leisure activities to do out side such as sports and youth clubs.
